Pre-Apocalypse[]: Almost nothing is known about Bill Jenkins' life prior to or as the outbreak began, except that he was a veteran and was confined to a wheelchair and lived in an apartment building with David Chambler and Miss Wilhelm .
Post-Apocalypse[]: After the outbreak began, Bill seemed to have attempted suicide by shooting himself in the face in his bathtub. However, Bill didn't succeed in destroying his brain so he reanimated. Bill was then found by Philip Blake many months later who put him down with a knife to the head.
Death[]: Killed By Himself (Suicide, Alive) Sometime during the outbreak, Bill shot himself in the face, but the bullet didn't make it to his brain, thus he reanimated. Philip Blake (Zombified) Philip Blake finds a zombified Bill, he stabs the man in the head.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Bill has killed: Himself (Suicide, Alive) Possibly numerous enemy combatants (Pre-Apocalypse) Possibly numerous counts of zombies and unnamed people
Relationships[]: David Chambler † - Neighbor Tara Chambler † - Neighbor Lilly Chambler † - Neighbor Meghan Chambler † - Neighbor Miss Wilhelm - Neighbor
